Contents showTocToggle("show","hide") 1 The institution 2 History 3 Education 4 Research schools and affiliated institutes 5 Alumni and other people associated with the Leiden University 6 See also 7 External links The institution The university has no central campus; its buildings are spread over the city. Some buildings like the Gravensteen (which currently houses the Leiden School of Management) are very old, while buildings like Plexus and Gorlaeus are much more modern... [cached version]
